bill.title: Advanced practice registered nurse collaboration. Changes "advanced practice nurse" references to "advanced practice registered nurse". Requires the Indiana state board of nursing to adopt rules concerning educational and certification requirements that an advanced practice registered nurse must meet to prescribe legend drugs. Requires that two members of the Indiana state board of nursing be advanced practice registered nurses with different specialty areas and addresses transition of current membership. Allows an advanced practice registered nurse to operate without a collaborative agreement with a practitioner if specified conditions are met, and requires these advanced practice registered nurses to attend additional continuing education.

history.action: First reading: referred to Committee on Public Health
